TEXT.TITLE: TANDEM COMPUTER <TDM> NOW TRADING ON NYSE
TEXT.BODY: Tandem Computer Inc said its common stock is now listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol TDM. The company's securities were previously traded on the NASDAQ National Market System under the synbol TNDM. Reuter
